alert.note: Alert for Penobscot (Maine) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued December 19 at 11:59AM EST until December 20 at 11:21AM EST by NWS Caribou
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Maine... Piscataquis River Above Dover-Foxcroft affecting Piscataquis County. Penobscot River At West Enfield affecting Penobscot County. Penobscot River At Eddington affecting Penobscot County. Piscataquis River At Medford affecting Penobscot and Piscataquis Counties. For the Piscataquis River...including Blanchard, Dover-Foxcroft, Abbot Climate Station, Medford...Minor flooding is forecast. For the Penobscot River...including Mattawamkeag, Grindstone, West Enfield, Eddington, Bangor...Moderate flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL LATE TOMORROW MORNING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Penobscot River at West Enfield. * WHEN...Until late tomorrow morning. * IMPACTS...At 18.0 feet, River is out of banks in several areas with high flows. Residents along the river should prepare for flooding if additional rises are expected. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 11:30 AM EST Tuesday the stage was 15.6 feet. - At 16.0 feet, river approaches bankfull. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage late this afternoon to a crest of 18.8 feet this evening. It will then fall below flood stage late tonight. - Flood stage is 18.0 feet. - Flood History...This crest compares to a previous crest of 18.8 feet on 04/16/2014. - For flood safety visit http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. Please report observed flooding to local emergency services or law enforcement and request they pass this information to the National Weather Service when you can do so safely. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. The next statement will be issued this evening at 700 PM EST.
